title: std library can not build for openwrt  mt7688

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
we use the openwrt  and the cpu is mt7688 ,we need to compile mipsel-unknown-linux-uclibc,when we build ,the error occure

```
native=/tmp/xargo.zHB2jKHFb0sK/target/mipsel-unknown-linux-uclibc/release/build/compiler_builtins-2512e083bf2db9eb/out`
error[E0432]: unresolved import `sys::net::netc::IPV6_ADD_MEMBERSHIP`
  --> /home/yangjie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/src/libstd/sys_common/net.rs:33:5
   |
33 | use sys::net::netc::IPV6_ADD_MEMBERSHIP;
   |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ no `IPV6_ADD_MEMBERSHIP` in the root. Did you mean to use `IP_ADD_MEMBERSHIP`?

error[E0432]: unresolved import `sys::net::netc::IPV6_DROP_MEMBERSHIP`
  --> /home/yangjie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/src/libstd/sys_common/net.rs:43:5
   |
43 | use sys::net::netc::IPV6_DROP_MEMBERSHIP;
   |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ no `IPV6_DROP_MEMBERSHIP` in the root. Did you mean to use `IP_DROP_MEMBERSHIP`?

error[E0308]: mismatched types
   --> /home/yangjie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/src/libstd/sys/unix/stack_overflow.rs:129:27
    |
129 |         action.sa_flags = SA_SIGINFO | SA_ONSTACK;
    |                           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ expected u32, found i32
    |
    = help: here are some functions which might fulfill your needs:
            - .count_ones()
            - .count_zeros()
            - .leading_zeros()
            - .trailing_zeros()

error: aborting due to 3 previous errors

error: Could not compile `std`.
```
